item.title: Christmas surprise 4000 bit bays for 5 days
item.dc:creator: @Munti Bjorn Alsos
item.description:
@Munti wrote:

BitBay Community

How to claim christmas surprise

The client (not Qt wallet) is able to use steganoghraphy. You can hide keys (or any other file) in pictures, and also extract them from there. The way it is normally used you simply hider one key in each picture, and load the pictures when you are...
